{{velocity output=false}} #set ($displayDocExtra = false) ## ## #set($obj = $doc.getObject('PhenoTips.CarePathwaysPostTestSheet', true)) #set($class = $obj.xWikiClass) #set($discard = $doc.use($obj)) ## Disable the Preview button #set($previewenabled = false) {{/velocity}} {{velocity}} (% class="" id="care-pathways-posttest-container"%)(((## {{html clean="false" wiki="false"}}

These questions should be completed following whole exome testing

property.name: Care Pathways post test form styles
Care Pathways gene and variant duplicate validator widget
Gene and variant delete behavior customizations

property.parameters: label=Care Pathways Post Test cssId=care-pathways-posttest-tab href=$doc.getURL("edit", "sheet=PhenoTips.CarePathwaysPostTestSheet&returnTo=$!{xcontext.action}") container=care-pathways-posttest-container order=1

property.content:
{{include reference="PhenoTips.PatientSheetMacros" /}} {{include reference="PhenoTips.FormMacros" /}} {{include reference="PhenoTips.CarePathways" /}} {{include reference="PhenoTips.TabelarDataMacros" /}} {{velocity output="false"}} $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.PatientSheetCode', {'colorTheme' : "$xwiki.getSpacePreference('colorTheme')"})## $xwiki.jsx.use('PhenoTips.PatientSheetCode')## $xwiki.jsx.use('PhenoTips.CarePathways')## $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.CarePathways')## $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.CarePathwaysPostTestSheet')## $xwiki.jsx.use('PhenoTips.CarePathwaysPostTestSheet')## $xwiki.jsx.use('PhenoTips.UIX_Field__gene-variants')## $xwiki.jsfx.use('uicomponents/widgets/extraGeneVariantData.js', true)## $xwiki.jsfx.use('uicomponents/widgets/geneVariantValidation.js', true)## $xwiki.ssfx.use('uicomponents/widgets/extraGeneVariantData.css', true)## $xwiki.jsfx.use('uicomponents/widgets/validation/scrollValidation.js')## #template('geneVariantMacros.vm')## #template('carePathwaysMacros.vm')## ## ## #set ($type = "primary") #set ($section = "posttest") #set ($storageClass = "PhenoTips.PatientCarePostTestClass") #set ($moduleSpecs = { "diagnostic":[ { 'question':'CPQ:7', 'questionLabel':"$!{services.vocabularies.care-pathways-questions.getTerm('CPQ:7').name}", 'modules':[ { 'pursuedDate':false, 'module':'test', 'submodule':'', 'subject':'proband', 'type':$type } ] }, { 'question':'CPQ:10', 'questionLabel':"$!{services.vocabularies.care-pathways-questions.getTerm('CPQ:10').name}", 'modules':[ { 'pursuedDate':true, 'module':'care', 'submodule':'', 'subject':'proband', 'type':$type }, { 'pursuedDate':true, 'module':'family', 'submodule':'', 'subject':'', 'type':$type } ] } ], "partially-diagnostic":[ { 'question':'CPQ:8', 'questionLabel':"$!{services.vocabularies.care-pathways-questions.getTerm('CPQ:8').name}", 'modules':[ { 'pursuedDate':true, 'module':'test', 'submodule':'', 'subject':'proband', 'type':$type } ] }, { 'question':'CPQ:11', 'questionLabel':"$!{services.vocabularies.care-pathways-questions.getTerm('CPQ:11').name}", 'modules':[ { 'pursuedDate':true, 'module':'care', 'submodule':'', 'subject':'proband', 'type':$type }, { 'pursuedDate':true, 'module':'family', 'submodule':'', 'subject':'', 'type':$type } ] } ], "non-diagnostic":[ { 'question':'CPQ:9', 'questionLabel':"$!{services.vocabularies.care-pathways-questions.getTerm('CPQ:9').name}", 'modules':[ { 'pursuedDate':true, 'module':'test', 'submodule':'', 'subject':'proband', 'type':$type } ] }, { 'question':'CPQ:12', 'questionLabel':"$!{services.vocabularies.care-pathways-questions.getTerm('CPQ:12').name}", 'modules':[ { 'pursuedDate':true, 'module':'care', 'submodule':'', 'subject':'proband', 'type':$type } ] } ] })## ## ## #macro (__displayPrimaryVariantsSection)
#__displayQuestionLabel("CPQ:4")
#__displayPrimaryVariantList("CPQ:4")##
#__displayQuestionLabel("CPQ:5")
#__displayPrimaryVariantAnalysis("CPQ:5")##
#end ## ## #macro (__displayQuestionLabel $questionId) $!{services.vocabularies.care-pathways-questions.getTerm("$questionId").name} #end ## ## #macro (__displayPrimaryVariantList $question) #set ($geneClassName = 'PhenoTips.GeneClass') #set ($variantClassName = 'PhenoTips.GeneVariantClass') #set ($cpGeneClassName = 'PhenoTips.CPGeneClass') #set ($cpVariantClassName = 'PhenoTips.CPGeneVariantClass') #set ($subject = 'proband') #set ($clearPrimaryData = $doc.getURL("get", "sheet=$!{class.name}&action=cpcleargenes&geneclassname=PhenoTips.CPGeneClass&variantclassname=PhenoTips.CPGeneVariantClass&genestatus=confirmed&variantstatus=primary&subject=proband&form_token=$!{services.csrf.getToken()}"))
{{/html}}## #__form_field('noPrimaryVariants') #__form_label('noPrimaryVariants' '' 'no primary variants')## {{html clean="false" wiki="false"}}##
{{/html}} #__gene_table($geneClassName, $variantClassName, {'tableIdPrefix' : 'patient-sheet__', 'tableClass' : 'patient-sheet', 'mode' : $xcontext.action, 'defaultProperties' : ['cdna', 'interpretation', 'zygosity'], 'inputStrings' : ['cdna','protein','transcript','dbsnp','start_position','end_position']}) {{html clean="false" wiki="false"}}

#end ## ## #macro (__displayPrimaryVariantAnalysis $question)
{{/html}}## #__form_field('primaryVariantAnalysis') {{html clean="false" wiki="false"}}##
#end ## ## #macro (__displayQuestionTable $questionId $modules)
$!{services.vocabularies.care-pathways-questions.getTerm($questionId).name}
#set ($lastIdx = $modules.size() - 1)## #__displayModuleGroup($questionId, '', '', $modules, ${lastIdx}, $sheet, $storageClass, true)##

#if ($specs)## #foreach ($spec in $specs)## #__displayQuestionTable($spec.get('question'), $spec.get('modules'))## #end## #end##
{{/html}}## #end ## ## {{/velocity}} {{velocity}} {{html clean="false" wiki="false"}} #set ($clearCategory = $doc.getURL("get", "sheet=$!{class.name}&cpclassname=${storageClass}&action=clearcategory&question=xXx__QUESTION_TEMPLATE__xXx&category=xXx__CATEGORY_TEMPLATE__xXx&form_token=$!{services.csrf.getToken()}")) #set ($deleteQualifier = $doc.getURL("objectremove", "classname=${storageClass}&classid=xXx__COUNT_TEMPLATE__xXx&form_token=$!{services.csrf.getToken()}")) #__displayPrimaryVariantsSection()## {{/html}}## #__displayStoredPrimaryData()## {{/velocity}}

property.content:
{{include reference="PhenoTips.PatientSheetMacros" /}} {{include reference="PhenoTips.FormMacros" /}} {{include reference="PhenoTips.CarePathways" /}} {{include reference="PhenoTips.TabelarDataMacros" /}} {{velocity output="false"}} $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.PatientSheetCode', {'colorTheme' : "$xwiki.getSpacePreference('colorTheme')"})## $xwiki.jsx.use('PhenoTips.PatientSheetCode')## $xwiki.jsx.use('PhenoTips.CarePathways')## $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.CarePathways')## $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.CarePathwaysPostTestSheet')## $xwiki.jsx.use('PhenoTips.CarePathwaysPostTestSheet')## $xwiki.jsx.use('PhenoTips.UIX_Field__gene-variants')## $xwiki.jsfx.use('uicomponents/widgets/extraGeneVariantData.js', true)## $xwiki.jsfx.use('uicomponents/widgets/geneVariantValidation.js', true)## $xwiki.ssfx.use('uicomponents/widgets/extraGeneVariantData.css', true)## $xwiki.jsfx.use('uicomponents/widgets/validation/scrollValidation.js')## #template('geneVariantMacros.vm')## #template('carePathwaysMacros.vm')## ## ## #set ($type = "secondary") #set ($section = "posttest") #set ($storageClass = "PhenoTips.PatientCarePostTestClass") #set ($moduleSpecs = { "proband":[ { 'question':'CPQ:13', 'questionLabel':"$!{services.vocabularies.care-pathways-questions.getTerm('CPQ:13').name}", 'modules':[ { 'pursuedDate':true, 'module':'care', 'submodule':'', 'subject':'proband', 'type':$type }, { 'pursuedDate':true, 'module':'family', 'submodule':'', 'subject':'', 'type':$type } ] } ], "mother":[ { 'question':'CPQ:14', 'questionLabel':"$!{services.vocabularies.care-pathways-questions.getTerm('CPQ:14').name}", 'modules':[ { 'pursuedDate':false, 'module':'care', 'submodule':'', 'subject':'mother', 'type':$type } ] } ], "father":[ { 'question':'CPQ:15', 'questionLabel':"$!{services.vocabularies.care-pathways-questions.getTerm('CPQ:15').name}", 'modules':[ { 'pursuedDate':false, 'module':'care', 'submodule':'', 'subject':'father', 'type':$type } ] } ] })## ## ## #macro (__displaySecondaryVariantsSection)
#__displayQuestionLabel("CPQ:6")
#__displaySecondaryVariantAnalysis("CPQ:6")
#end ## ## #macro (__displayQuestionLabel $questionId) $!{services.vocabularies.care-pathways-questions.getTerm("$questionId").name} #end ## ## #macro (__displaySecondaryVariantAnalysis $question) #set ($clearSecondaryData = $doc.getURL("get", "sheet=$!{class.name}&associateddataclass=$storageClass&action=cpcleargenes&geneclassname=PhenoTips.CPGeneClass&variantclassname=PhenoTips.CPGeneVariantClass&genestatus=confirmed_secondary&variantstatus=$type&form_token=$!{services.csrf.getToken()}"))
{{/html}}## #__form_field('noSecondaryVariants') #__form_label('noSecondaryVariants' '' 'no secondary variants')## {{html clean="false" wiki="false"}}##
#__displaySubjectBoxes('secondary-wes-variants')##
#end ## ## #macro (__displaySubjectBoxes $itemClass) #set ($geneClassName = 'PhenoTips.CPGeneClass') #set ($variantClassName = 'PhenoTips.CPGeneVariantClass') #set ($geneStatus = 'confirmed_secondary')## #set ($variantStatus = $type)##
    #set ($subject = 'proband')##

  • Proband

    {{/html}} #__gene_table($geneClassName, $variantClassName, {'geneFilters' : [{'propName' : 'subject', 'propValue' : $subject}, {'propName' : 'status', 'propValue' : $geneStatus}], 'variantFilters' : [{'propName' : 'subject', 'propValue' : $subject}, {'propName' : 'status', 'propValue' : $variantStatus}], 'tableIdPrefix' : 'proband-secondary__', 'tableClass' : 'cp-variants', 'mode' : $xcontext.action, 'defaultProperties' : ['cdna', 'onset', 'interpretation'], 'inputStrings' : ['cdna','protein','transcript','dbsnp','start_position','end_position']}) {{html clean="false" wiki="false"}}
    • #set ($subject = 'mother')##

$!{services.vocabularies.care-pathways-questions.getTerm($questionId).name}

#set ($modules = $variantModules.get($key))## #set ($lastIdx = $modules.size() - 1)## #set ($term = $services.vocabularies.hgnc.getTerm($!{key.getProperty('gene').value}))## #__displayModuleGroup($questionId, $key.number, "$!{term.symbol} [$!{key.getProperty('cdna').value}]", $modules, ${lastIdx}, $sheet, $storageClass, true)##
#end##
#end ## ## #macro (__displayStoredSecondaryData) #set ($sheet = "$!{class.name}") {{html clean="false" wiki="false"}}##

{{/html}}## #end ## ## {{/velocity}} {{velocity}} {{html clean="false" wiki="false"}} #__displaySecondaryVariantsSection()## {{/html}}## #__displayStoredSecondaryData()## {{/velocity}}
